SharpMimeTools Documented Class Library

SharpMimeHeader Properties

The properties of the SharpMimeHeader class are listed below. For a complete list of SharpMimeHeader class members, see the SharpMimeHeader Members topic.

Public Static Properties

EncodingDefault Gets or sets the default Encoding used when it isn't defined otherwise.

Public Instance Properties

BodyPosition Gets the point where the headers end
Cc Gets CC header field
ContentDisposition Gets Content-Disposition header field
ContentDispositionParameters Gets the elements found in the Content-Disposition header body
ContentID Gets Content-ID header field
ContentLocation Gets Content-Location header field
ContentLocationParameters Gets the elements found in the Content-Location header body
ContentTransferEncoding Gets Content-Transfer-Encoding header field
ContentType Gets Content-Type header field
ContentTypeParameters Gets the elements found in the Content-Type header body
Count Gets the number of header fields found
Date Gets Date header field
Encoding Gets Encoding found on the headers and applies to the body
From Gets From header field
Item Gets header fields
MessageID Gets Message-ID header field
RawHeaders Gets Raw headers
Reply Gets reply address as defined by rfc 2822
ReplyTo Gets Reply-To header field
ReturnPath Gets Return-Path header field
Sender Gets Sender header field
Subject Gets Subject header field
SubType Gets SubType from Content-Type header field
To Gets To header field
TopLevelMediaType Gets top-level media type from Content-Type header field
Version Gets Version header field
